message.content: {"given_definition_quality":58,"better_definition":"computer","sentence":"学生用电脑。","image_prompt":"A young student sitting at a simple desk uses a computer. The computer screen glows softly, displaying a calming interface, while the room has gentle, post-apocalyptic lighting with soft, muted hues and subtle signs of nature reclaiming the space (such as a plant growing next to the desk). The student looks focused but relaxed in a safe and slightly futuristic environment. Soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"The student uses a computer."}
